page.title: 02SCORTON GREEN
page.content: Originally the Green was a rubbish tip,because there were no dustbin men.People used to dump all their rubbish in the middle of the village. The first headmaster of the Grammar School,Mr.Noble,decided to have it levelled and grassed over and to have a wall built round it.The Green is about two hundred years old and the wall was made about a hundred and fifty years ago.The boys at the Grammar School used the Green as a cricket pitch. The Green belongs to the people of Scorton and it will never be built on.There are only two other raised Greens in the whole of England. We play on it.Village cricket teams have matches on it every weekend during the summer time.
